Rules of Machine Learning

This document provides best practices for machine learning engineering from Google, aiming to help those with basic knowledge of machine learning get the most out of these guidelines. It presents a style similar to the Google C++ Style Guide and other popular guides to practical programming. The document assumes readers have taken a class in machine learning or built/worked on a machine-learned model.

Key Concepts:

  • Machine Learning
  • Best Practices
  • ML Engineering
  • The importance of experimentation in gathering statistics
  • Choosing between simple and complex heuristics for machine learning
  • The role of infrastructure in pipeline development
  • Silent Failures in Machine Learning Systems
  • Importance of Data Refresh
  • Feature Column Ownership and Documentation
  • dynamic content generation
